what: Pull all juvenile salmon catches from surface trawls in the Northern Bering Sea and include zero-catches
title: Join Event Catch Examples
code: df <- join_event_catch(start_year = 2003, # Defaults to 2003 if no argument entered.                        end_year = 2024,                        survey_region = c("NBS"),                        tsn = c(161975,161976,161977,161979,161980),                        lhs = "J",                        gear = c("CAN"), # There are no Nor264 surface trawls in NBS.                        trawl_method = c("S"),                        catch0 = TRUE) #> Warning in join_event_catch(start_year = 2003, end_year = 2024, survey_region = #> c("NBS"), : Local data files exist. Formatting file from those exports #> [1] "Last AKFIN catch table upload date 2026-01-02T10:38:05Z"  nrow(df); head(df) #> [1] 4630 #> # A tibble: 6 × 45 #>    station_id event_code gear  species_tsn common_name  scientific_name lhs_code #>         <dbl>      <int> <chr>       <int> <chr>        <chr>           <chr>    #> 1 20030101001          3 CAN        161977 Coho Salmon  Oncorhynchus k… J        #> 2 20030101001          3 CAN        161979 Sockeye Sal… Oncorhynchus n… J        #> 3 20030101001          3 CAN        161980 Chinook Sal… Oncorhynchus t… J        #> 4 20030101001          3 CAN        161976 Chum Salmon  Oncorhynchus k… J        #> 5 20030101001          3 CAN        161975 Pink Salmon  Oncorhynchus g… J        #> 6 20030101002          3 CAN        161977 Coho Salmon  Oncorhynchus k… J        #> # ℹ 38 more variables: cruise_id <chr>, sample_year <int>, tow_type <chr>, #> #   gear_performance <chr>, region <chr>, eq_time <dttm>, eq_latitude <dbl>, #> #   eq_longitude <dbl>, gear_in_time <dttm>, gear_in_latitude <dbl>, #> #   gear_in_longitude <dbl>, gear_out_time <dttm>, gear_out_latitude <dbl>, #> #   gear_out_longitude <dbl>, haulback_time <dttm>, haulback_latitude <dbl>, #> #   haulback_longitude <dbl>, tow_duration <dbl>, master_station_name <chr>, #> #   nbs_strata <int>, bsierp_region <int>, oceanographic_domain <int>, …

title: Queries AKFIN APIs containing EMA data and formats data export for analysis
text: EMA survey data nuanced, survey design sample processing changed throughout timeseries. Please use vignettes see -progress write-important data concepts. Introduction vignette

title: Queries AKFIN APIs containing EMA data and formats data export for analysis
text: package functions automate querying formatting EMA datasets. beginner users, recommend using following two functions: join_event_catch() catch data. function queries event catch data, passes filters entered arguments function filter respective data products joining together. Arguments include year range, survey region, gear used, trawl method, species code/lhs. detailed breakdown use view join event catch guide vignette join_event_fish() specimen data users experienced EMA data nuances data, can set filters joins using individual data obtained following functions: get_ema_event (sampling events) get_ema_event_parameters (post-sampling calculated event values (.e. effort, footrope depth)) get_ema_catch (catch data) get_ema_fish (specimen data) get_ema_taxonomy (species tsn lookup). Note, moment join_event_catch join_event_fish filtering arguments built functions. function calls simply query API link full complete datasets can take minutes download AKFIN. issues, please post EMAdownload github issues

what: Get EMA catch and event data — join_event_catch
title: Get EMA catch and event data — join_event_catch
text: function queries joins event catch data hosted AKFIN collected Ecosystem Monitoring Assessment (EMA) surveys. includes parameters control start end year, gear type, survey region, trawl method, tsn (taxonomic serial number), lhs code (life history stage), whether calculate catch0 (true/false)

title: Get EMA catch and event data — join_event_catch
code: join_event_catch(   start_year = 2003,   end_year = 3000,   survey_region = NA,   tsn = NA,   lhs = NA,   gear = c("CAN", "Nor264"),   trawl_method = "S",   catch0 = FALSE )

title: Get EMA catch and event data — join_event_catch
text: start_year Optional filter start year, valid range 2003 present, defaults 2003 end_year Optional filter end year, valid range 2002 present, defaults 3000 survey_region Optional filter survey region.  Defaults regions. Options "SEBS", "NBS", "Chukchi", "GOA"  Can take vector multiple regions. filter based classification large marine ecosystem latitude separation Northern Southern Bering Sea 59.9 N seperation NBS Chukchi 65.5. Stations sorted region rather survey objective (.e. survey may survey go "Chukchi", stations occurred Northern Bering Sea stations get classified NBS stations). tsn Filter species taxonomic serial number (ITIS.gov), defaults species database. Can take vectors species tsns. parameter optional catch0=FALSE, required catch0=TRUE.  Use get_ema_taxonomy function see full list TSNs. lhs Optional filter species life history stage.  salmon species, options IM J. species, see values EMA-lookup-table. gear Optional filter gear type, options CAN, MAR, NETS156, Nor64, defaults CAN & Nor64 (surface trawls). Can take vector multiple gear types trawl_method Optional filter trawl tow method (.e. surface, midwater, oblique, live box (surface trawl live box), fishing power comparison, diel tows) See look table full explanation category. Default "S" surface tow. catch0 Optional argument indicates whether data include 0-catches (.e. stations fished species/lhs combinations caught). Defaults false argument entered. However, catch0 == FALSE give events NOTHING caught net

title: Get EMA catch and event data — join_event_catch
text: Returns data frame event information catch data

title: Get EMA catch and event data — join_event_catch
code: df <- join_event_catch(start_year=2002,end_year=2024, survey_region=c("SEBS","NBS"),tsn=c(161980,934083),lhs=c("J","A0"),catch0=TRUE) #> [1] "Last AKFIN catch table upload date 2026-01-02T10:38:05Z"

what: Get EMA fish specimen data with event information — join_event_fish
title: Get EMA fish specimen data with event information — join_event_fish
text: function pulls specimen level data associated event information ecosystem survey data (EMA surveys) AKFIN data server. includes parameters control start end year, gear type, TSN (species code). function, nature type data returns, provides specimen data locations positive catch may want catch weight specimen data case use join_event_catch function get associated catch information. join station ID, event code, gear code.

title: Get EMA fish specimen data with event information — join_event_fish
code: join_event_fish(   start_year = 2003,   end_year = 3000,   survey_region = NA,   tsn = NA,   gear = c("CAN", "Nor264"),   trawl_method = "S" )

title: Get EMA fish specimen data with event information — join_event_fish
text: start_year Optional filter start year, valid range 2002 present defaults 2002 end_year Optional filter end year, valid range 2002 present defaults 3000 survey_region Optional filter survey region.  Defaults regions. Options "SEBS", "NBS", "Chukchi", "GOA"  Can take vector multiple regions. filter based classification large marine ecosystem latitude separation Northern Southern Bering Sea 59.9 N seperation NBS Chukchi 65.5. Stations sorted region rather survey objective (.e. survey may survey go "Chukchi", stations occurred Northern Bering Sea stations get classified NBS stations). tsn Optional filter species taxonomic serial number (ITIS.gov), defaults species database. Can take vectors species tsn gear Optional filter gear type, options CAN, MAR, NETS156, Nor64, defaults CAN. Can take vector multiple gear types trawl_method Optional filter trawl tow method (.e. surface, midwater, oblique, live box (surface trawl live box), fishing power comparison, diel tows) See look table full explanation category. Default "S" surface tow.

title: Get EMA fish specimen data with event information — join_event_fish
text: Returns data frame event information specimen data (lengths, weights, special samples taken)
